basics.name: clusterName
basics.label: Cluster name (3-12 letters or numbers)
basics.toolTip: Cluster name will be used as prefix for most resources created for this cluster and must be unique within your account.

constraints.validationMessage: Cluster name between 3 and 10 characters long and can contain only numbers and lowercase letters

basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: Admin Username
basics.toolTip: Username to use for SSH access to the virtual machines

constraints.validationMessage: Admin Username must be 3 to 12 alphanumeric characters

toolTip.authenticationType: Which authentication type to use when connecting to the virtual machines: Password or SSH Public Key
toolTip.password: Password to use for SSH access to the virtual machines
toolTip.sshPublicKey: Public key for passwordless SSH access to the virtual machines. The OpenSSH public key can be generated with tools like ssh-keygen on Linux or OS X.

basics.name: gemfireDatanodeCount
basics.label: Number of Data Nodes
basics.toolTip: Each data node will have 17G storage capacity and you should have at least 2 for fault tolerance

basics.name: allowedInboundIPAddressCIDR
basics.label: GemFire on Azure Project Version
basics.toolTip: Optionally restrict inbound connections to a source ip address range specified with a CIDR block

constraints.validationMessage: Please provide a valid CIDR block

basics.name: gemfireOnAzureProjectTag
basics.label: GemFire on Azure Project Version
basics.toolTip: The version of the GemFire on Azure project to use for this deployments.  The default value, 'master' points to the latest release

constraints.validationMessage: GemFire Azure project version must be between 3 and 64 characters in length and may contain numbers, letters , hyphens, underscores and periods
